body:
Comment 2 by **alexaandru**: 
Here's an attempt to reproduce the same on Windows:

Given a GOPATH of "C:\GoWorkspace" and a project under that path
"github.com/alexaandru/csvsplit", running "go build -gcflags=-s" from the project
folder, results in the following output:

# github.com/alexaandru/csvsplit
C:/GoWorkspace/src/github.com/alexaandru/csvsplit/C:\GoWorkspace\src\github.com\alexaandru\csvsplit\csvsplit.go:19:
redundant type: options
C:/GoWorkspace/src/github.com/alexaandru/csvsplit/C:\GoWorkspace\src\github.com\alexaandru\csvsplit\csvsplit.go:20:
redundant type: options

Running it from elsewhere (C:\) and giving the project name (go build -gcflags=-s
github.com/alexaandru/csvsplit) results in identical output.
